about_the_game:
This DLC gives Brendan Keogh's Putting Challenge players exclusive and unlimited access to the luxury petrol powered golf carts of both Uptown Greens and Downtown Greens golf courses. The golf cart helps you travel around much faster, and has room for up to three friends!

Please be respectful on the greens and keep a safe distance from your friends while they take their shot.

**Note that golf carts should not be removed under any circumstances from their respective golf course.

Luxury Cart DLC Features:

  • Move around the golf course up to 3-times faster!
  • Up to 4 players can sit in a single golf cart
  • 2 new exclusive music tracks by Dan Golding (Untitled Goose Game, Frog Detective)
  • Access to 2 further achievements
detailed_description:
DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION

Brendan Keogh's Putting Challenge: Championship Edition

Championship Edition is a bundle that includes the base game of Brendan Keogh's Putting Challenge + The Luxury Golf Cart + OST
